text: ketalaka loko eva pana che je allahana bhagidara theravine te'othi evi muhabbata rakhe che jevi muhabbata allahathi hovi jo'i'e, ane imanavala'o allahani muhabbatamam ghana ja sakhata hoya che, kadaca musarika loko janata jyare ke allahani yatanane jo'i (jani lese) ke dareka prakarani takata allahane ja che ane allaha sakhata yatana apanara che, (to kadapi allaha sathe bhagidara na theravata)
